elite_levels.description: Can deploy up to 4 Resonators (Can store up to 6); The first enemy that steps on a Resonator will trigger its effect
Can deploy up to 6 Resonator traps (Can store up to 8); The first enemy that steps on a Resonator will trigger its effect. On deployment, immediately deploys 1 Resonator within Attack Range
Can deploy up to 8 Resonator traps (Can store up to 10); The first enemy that steps on a Resonator will trigger its effect. On deployment, immediately deploys 2 Resonators within Attack Range

potential_upgrades.description: Can deploy up to 6 (+2) Resonator traps (Can store up to 6); The first enemy that steps on a Resonator will trigger its effect
Can deploy up to 8 (+2) Resonator traps (Can store up to 8); The first enemy that steps on a Resonator will trigger its effect. On deployment, immediately deploys 1 Resonator within Attack Range
Can deploy up to 10 (+2) Resonator traps (Can store up to 10); The first enemy that steps on a Resonator will trigger its effect. On deployment, immediately deploys 2 Resonators within Attack Range

elite_levels.description: After a trap activates, Dorothy gains +2% ATK, stacking up to 10 times

potential_upgrades.description: After a trap activates, Dorothy gains +2% ATK, stacking up to 12 (+2) times
